Vendor List

Ted Lasso’s Team-Building & Coaching

Whether you're organizing a corporate event or a team retreat, Ted’s all about bringing people together. With a little positivity, teamwork, and maybe even a biscuit or two, your event is guaranteed to be a winner! His secret? Belief, kindness, and a whole lot of heart—because a great event starts with great people.

Roy Kent Security Services

Need top-tier security? Roy Kent’s got it covered. No nonsense, no trouble—just a safe and smooth event where everything runs like clockwork. If you want an event that stays on track, you need someone who doesn’t take any nonsense. And trust us, Roy doesn’t

Coach Beard’s Silent DJ Services

No words, just music. Whether it’s deep house, classic rock, or something completely unexpected, Beard curates the perfect playlist to keep the party going—all without saying a word. His vibe is mysterious, his music is legendary, and your dance floor will never be the same again.

Jamie Tartt VIP Services

Looking for that extra touch of luxury? Jamie Tartt’s VIP experience brings exclusive seating, top-tier service, and just the right amount of flash. Because every event deserves a little ✨star power✨—and with Jamie’s touch, your guests will feel like true VIPs from start to finish.
